name: 2D Platformer (Matthew Crandall)
description:
Game Modifications 

1.) A 3rd, much more complex level.

2.) Altering values and parameters in Unity to make the game play better (more enjoyable for the player).

3.) Reusing assets from the 2D Shooter Project (such as the space background).

4.) A hidden puzzle in the 3rd level (check the instructions for a hint).

Credits:

Created by Matthew Crandall
